name: Zoho Writer Shortcut
summary: A ZDOC file is a shortcut used to open a Zoho Writer document. Zoho Docs Sync, Zoho WorkDrive Sync, and Zoho WorkDrive TrueSync create ZDOC files when a user syncs their cloud Zoho Writer documents to their PC. ZDOC files contain only a shortcut to a document; they do not contain the document itself.
